product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner design features a soft and elegant theme suited for jewelry promotion. The background is a smooth radial gradient with layered pastel-colored circles that add depth and visual interest. At the center is an image of a stunning pair of rose gold earrings. The top section includes a bold headline (`heading`) to draw immediate attention, followed by a stylish subheading (`subheading`) that describes the product material and finish in an italic font. Near the bottom, a prominently placed price tag (`price`) adds focus with a large font. A rectangular button with a contrasting background (`cta_background`) and clear call-to-action text (`cta`) completes the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink: `#FFF0F5`
- Rose Pink: `#FFD3DB`
- Soft Coral: `#FFCAD4`, `#F8B8C4`
- Accent Maroon: `#8B3A62`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a delicate pair of earrings that combine soft blush pink tones with sparkling white crystals, creating a luxurious and feminine aesthetic. The dominant color is a metallic rose gold (#F2A6A0), which outlines the structure and base of the design. This is harmoniously blended with a soft pastel pink (#FAD2D3) teardrop element that adds warmth and elegance. The crystals are clear and highly reflective, giving off a pure white sparkle (#FFFFFF) with subtle hints of icy blue (#EAF6F9) due to light reflections. These hues contrast and complement each other beautifully, making them ideal for a sophisticated, elegant advertisement banner.
